body_html: The issue is that there is no function to retrieve only the shadow variables. Something like tf.moving_average_shadow_variables(). Because tf.moving_average_variables() returns the variables which moving average is applied.
body_text: The issue is that there is no function to retrieve only the shadow variables. Something like tf.moving_average_shadow_variables(). Because tf.moving_average_variables() returns the variables which moving average is applied.
body: The issue is that there is no function to retrieve only the shadow variables. Something like tf.moving_average_shadow_variables(). Because tf.moving_average_variables() returns the variables which moving average is applied.
